# Karmic Retribution (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Hexblade Spells|Hexblade 4]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 109

*By manipulating fate itself, you ensure that any who attack you suffer greatly for their insolence.*

This spell functions like *[[Karmic Aura (Spell)|karmic aura]]**,* except that any creature that damages you and fails its Will save becomes [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round.
